creation.title: Create New Task
creation.description: Describe what you want to build

empty.title: No tasks yet
empty.description: Create your first task to get started

kanban.emptyBacklogHint: Add a task to get started
kanban.cannotEditWhileRunning: Cannot edit while task is running
kanban.worktreeCleanupStaged: This task has been staged and has a worktree. Would you like to clean up the worktree?
kanban.worktreeCleanupNotStaged: This task has a worktree with changes that have not been merged. Delete the worktree to mark as done, or cancel to review the changes first.
kanban.orderSaveFailedDescription: Your task order change was applied but couldn't be saved to storage. It will be lost on refresh.

files.title: Files
files.selectFile: Select a file to view its contents

images.pasteHint: Tip: Paste screenshots directly with {{shortcut}} to add reference images.

notifications.backgroundTaskDescription: The task is still running. You can reopen this dialog to monitor progress.

wizard.createDescription: Describe what you want to build. The AI will analyze your request and create a detailed specification.
wizard.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the feature, bug fix, or improvement you want to implement. Be as specific as possible about requirements, constraints, and expected behavior. Type @ to reference files.

worktreeNotice.title: Isolated Workspace
worktreeNotice.description: This task runs in an isolated git worktree. Your main branch stays safe until you choose to merge.

gitOptions.title: Git Options (optional)
gitOptions.helpText: Override the branch this task's worktree will be created from. Leave empty to use the project's configured default branch.
gitOptions.useWorktreeDescription: Creates changes in a separate git worktree for safe review before merging. Disable to build directly in your project (faster but riskier).

errors.createFailed: Failed to create task. Please try again.

feedback.dragDropHint: Drag & drop images or paste screenshots

review.mergeTooltip: Merges changes from the task's worktree branch back to your base branch. AI will resolve any conflicts. You can then choose whether to keep or remove the worktree.

edit.title: Edit Task
edit.description: Update task details including title, description, classification, images, and settings. Changes will be saved to the spec files.

errors.updateFailed: Failed to update task. Please try again.

form.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the feature, bug fix, or improvement you want to implement. Be as specific as possible about requirements, constraints, and expected behavior.
form.titlePlaceholder: Leave empty to auto-generate from description
form.titleHelpText: A short, descriptive title will be generated automatically if left empty.
form.requireReviewDescription: When enabled, you'll be prompted to review the spec and implementation plan before the coding phase begins. This allows you to approve, request changes, or provide feedback.

errors.invalidImageType: Invalid image type. Allowed: PNG, JPEG, GIF, WebP

classification.helpText: These labels help organize and prioritize tasks. They're optional but useful for filtering.
